Actions.Name: Analyze Image
Actions.Description: This operation extracts a rich set of visual features based on the image content.

Actions.Name: Describe Image Content
Actions.Description: This operation generates a description of image content in human readable language with complete sentences.

Actions.Name: Describe Image URL
Actions.Description: This operation generates a description of an image URL in human readable language with complete sentences.

Actions.Name: Describe Image
Actions.Description: This operation generates a description of an image in human readable language with complete sentences.

Actions.Name: Detect Objects
Actions.Description: Generates a list of deteced objects in the supplied image.

Actions.Name: Get Area of Interest
Actions.Description: Returns a bounding box around the most important area of the image.

Actions.Name: Generate Thumbnail
Actions.Description: This operation generates a thumbnail image with the user-specified width and height.

Actions.Name: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to Text
Actions.Description: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) detects text in an image and extracts the recognized characters into a text file.

Actions.Name: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to JSON
Actions.Description: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) detects text in an image and extracts the recognized characters into a machine-usable JSON stream.

Actions.Name: Recognize Domain Specific Content
Actions.Description: Recognize celebrities or landmarks in an image.

Actions.Name: Tag Image
Actions.Description: Generates a list of words, or tags, that are relevant to the content of the supplied image.
